name: EchoClip
description: record and clip your gameplay press f6 to save last 5 attempts, message axiom_thebsdude on discord if you have any issues or suggestions

enabled.name: Enable Recording
enabled.description: start recording automatically when entering a level

capture-resolution.name: Capture Resolution
capture-resolution.description: higher = better quality but more cpu usage

target-fps.name: Target FPS
target-fps.description: recording framerate higher = smoother but more cpu usage

clip-length.name: Clip Length
clip-length.description: how many attempts to keep in the clip

crf-quality.name: Video Quality
crf-quality.description: lower = better quality bigger file 23 is default 18 is visually lossless 28 is small
